import React, { useState } from 'react' import { CoursesNav } from '../Course/CourseNav/CoursesNav' import Modal from '../Widgets/Modal/Modal'; import './MyProfileStyles.css' export const MyProfile = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({fname:"Paras", dname:"Paras Manchanda", lname:"Manchanda",tarea:"I am a Programmer.", check:"Developer", radio:"Professional", info:"0-5",exp:"Java", role:"Softwaer Enginner-2" }); function handleSubmit(e:any) { e.preventDefault() console.log({username: user.exp, password: user.dname }) let modal = document.querySelector(".modal"); } let name, value; const handleInputs = (e:any) => { console.log(e); name = e.target.name; value = e.target.value; setUser({...user, [name]:value}); } const [state, setState] = useState({modal : false}); const selectModal = (info : any) => { setState({modal: !state.modal}) // true/false toggle } return (


) } function useForm(): { register: any; handleSubmit: any; } { throw new Error('Function not implemented.'); }
